title: There Are Infinite Mikan Days!
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>These mikans look good, these mikans look good ğ… <:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Chika-chan, youâ€™re in a good mood~ Were they on sale?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>These mikans were free! Is today Mikan Day?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Is it not today?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>December 3rd is the official day, but itâ€™s also the third day of every month~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Isnâ€™t that too many Mikan Days......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Doesnâ€™t that just mean...... thereâ€™s a high demand for mikans!? Here, Hanamaru-chan, have some ğ… <:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Thank you~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
